attributes.action: Oppose the 39th Premier League Game outside England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The addition of a 39th game is purely designed to make more revenue for the rich football clubs, but will do nothing to help the England football team, football league teams or grass roots football.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EPLabroad/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
